parameters.definition: Volume of honey a glass jar can hold
Volume of honey a plastic jar can hold
Minimum ratio of plastic jars to glass jars to be filled
Minimum number of glass jars to be filled

description: A honey farmer sells his honey in glass and plastic jars. A glass jar can hold \param{VolGlass} ml of honey while a plastic jar can hold \param{VolPlastic} ml of honey. Since glass jars are more expensive, at least \param{MinRatio} times as many plastic jars must be filled as glass jars. However, at least \param{MinGlass} glass jars should be filled. If the farmer has \param{TotalHoney} ml of honey, how many jars of each should be filled to maximize the total number of bottles filled?
